title: SaaS

hero_subtitle: From onboarding to retention, SendX helps SaaS companies automate their customer journey with powerful workflows, integrations, and AI-driven campaigns.

features.title: Seamless integrations with your SaaS stack

content.text: Connect SendX with your existing tools. Our Stripe integration lets you trigger emails based on payment events, while integrations with Hubspot, Intercom, and more keep your data in sync.
